name: One Nightstand
description: Alone. Dark. Only Stan with his lamp. You must fight your way out of an infested house, avoiding monsters and your poor decisions, only seen in your darkest nightmares. What is that hum?...it Hertz. You only have your light. It's your weapon, your health, your visibility, and how you interact with your world. Don't run out of light or you will be left helpless. Will you have Watt it takes to survive your walk of shame?
